newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to watch - April 7.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to watch - April 7.

text.p: * Motorola Inc is expected to report first quarter earnings per share of $0.45, compared to $0.63 in the year-ago period, according to First Call. The stock closed at 59-3/4 Friday.
* Encad Inc said it expects first quarter earnings to rise to $0.31 from the year-ago $0.18. The First Call estimate is $0.29. Shares closed at 29-5/8.
* MetaTools Inc said it expects first quarter per share earnings between nil and $0.01. The First Call estimate is $0.05. The stock closed at 8-1/8.

* Bankers Trust New York Corp and retail brokerage firm Alex. Brown Inc said Sunday they had signed a definitive agreement to merge in a stock swap valued at about $1.7 billion. Bankers Trust closed at 82-1/4 and Alex. Brown closed at 53-1/8.
* Boeing Co was up 1/2 at 98-1/2 in London after the Wall Street Journal reported that the company plans to boost its production rate for all planes by 10 percent beyond previously announced levels.
* Oil stocks, which took a hammering last week due to weak crude prices, were moderately higher in London. Exxon Corp was up 3/8 to 102 and Texaco Inc was ahead 1/2 to 104.
